tweets.text: We're mounting a wide-ranging investigation into reports of damage to the #RiverLugg, which is protected through SSSI status. We're treating this very seriously, working with @NaturalEngland & @ForestryComm who have taken immediate action to prevent any further works at the site. https://t.co/bvhnTETfal

BEFORE & AFTER

Appalling #EcoVandalism at The #RiverLugg SSSI #Herefordshire

THIS IS ILLEGAL ACTIVITY

So it's a CRITICAL TEST CASE for environmental enforcement by @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK

The @WildlifeTrusts will be making sure appropriate legal action is taken https://t.co/U8lt4ZuX1t

"Be in no doubt that anything less than a prosecution and full restoration of the river, paid for by the perpetrator, will be acceptable‚Äù.

@EnvAgency and others want to prove they are fit for the 21st century? Here's your chance. https://t.co/ji0wmcYyhf
@Brizzleangler @Feargal_Sharkey @bettwsresident @WUFoundation @EnvAgencyMids I am working on the clip, my computer skills are rusty!

A mile of the River Lugg has been bulldozed to destruction.
Bankside trees grubbed out & burnt.
Riverbed scraped out.
Meanders reprofiled.
Disaster for downstream wildlife.
This was an SSSI.
No consent was sought. 
@EnvAgency must surely prosecute this.
RT
https://t.co/cSBhrR2nDW

Our chair @EmmaHowardBoyd gave a speech at @InstWater's Environment Conference on #climatechange and the water environment.

See how we're preparing for future challenges and opportunities üëá

https://t.co/qjkSvRNivV

@ParkerEss @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil I just don't get what benefit they thought they'd get? If the intention was to improve adjacent farm land surely all they've done is increase the likelihood of losing their top soil from run off into the river. 

Leaving aside the horrific vandalism, I just don't get the intent.

@sunneofyork @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil Yes, and are there issues with public footpaths which I suspect are that side of the river. @HfdsCouncil

@richardathome @jane_studio @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil If someone suspects a crime is being committed on private land then surely police have authority to attend the scene?

@jamesoflynn @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil Part of the suicidal war on nature perhaps?
And/or simply for money

tweets.text:
Our full statement from the @WildlifeTrusts about the appalling #EcoVandalism at the #RiverLugg SSSI in #Herefordshire can be found here...

https://t.co/ODAuQYUYhz

We're taking this incident at a SSSI very seriously and are investigating reports of damage to the #RiverLugg. We're investigating in partnership with 
@NaturalEngland & @ForestryComm https://t.co/1cG6B6hOui

Curiouser and curiouser.

The redoubtable @bettwsresident CEO of @WUFoundation making it very clear  that @EnvAgencyMids were alerted to the destruction that was taking place on the River Lugg last week. 

Did EA the respond? If not why not.

Starts 8:37

https://t.co/XbNCDTpqIL

Today we have published an annual report to summarise our work relating to geological disposal of radioactive waste #geologicaldisposal @rwm_gdf_uk @The_ONR https://t.co/6ygymcVzZ1 https://t.co/eShrFceN0d
